text: I'm down to the last deck for my article, I have [[Rakdos, the Defiler]], [[Firesong and Sunspeaker]], [[Licia, Sanguine Tribune]], [[Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician]], I'm struggling between choosing another one. The article is on [[Treasonous Ogre]] btw

attachments.fallback: Rakdos the Defiler {2}{B}{B}{R}{R} // Legendary Creature — Demon // Flying, trample // Whenever Rakdos the Defiler attacks, sacrifice half the non-Demon permanents you control, rounded up. // Whenever Rakdos deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices half the non-Demon permanents they control, rounded up. // 7/6
attachments.text:
Legendary Creature — Demon
Flying, trample
Whenever Rakdos the Defiler attacks, sacrifice half the non-Demon permanents you control, rounded up.
Whenever Rakdos deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices half the non-Demon permanents they control, rounded up.
*7/6*
attachments.title: Rakdos the Defiler {2}{B}{B}{R}{R}

attachments.fallback: Firesong and Sunspeaker {4}{R}{W} // Legendary Creature — Minotaur Cleric // Red instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink. // Whenever a white instant or sorcery spell causes you to gain life, Firesong and Sunspeaker deals 3 damage to target creature or player. // 4/6
attachments.text:
Legendary Creature — Minotaur Cleric
Red instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink.
Whenever a white instant or sorcery spell causes you to gain life, Firesong and Sunspeaker deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
_The peaks of Hurloon never fall silent._
*4/6*
attachments.title: Firesong and Sunspeaker {4}{R}{W}

attachments.fallback: Licia, Sanguine Tribune {5}{R}{W}{B} // Legendary Creature — Vampire Soldier // This spell costs {1} less to cast for each 1 life you gained this turn. // First strike, lifelink // Pay 5 life: Put three +1/+1 counters on Licia, Sanguine Tribune. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn. // 4/4
attachments.text:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Soldier
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each 1 life you gained this turn.
First strike, lifelink
Pay 5 life: Put three +1/+1 counters on Licia, Sanguine Tribune. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.
_"I give my blood, my life, all I have in exchange for victory."_
*4/4*
attachments.title: Licia, Sanguine Tribune {5}{R}{W}{B}

attachments.fallback: Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician {3}{R} // Legendary Creature — Goblin Advisor // Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, sacrifice it. If you do, it deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it. // Sacrifice two Mountains: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. // 3/2
attachments.text:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Advisor
Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, sacrifice it. If you do, it deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it.
Sacrifice two Mountains: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
_"Everybody but me—CHARGE!"_
*3/2*
attachments.title: Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician {3}{R}

attachments.fallback: Treasonous Ogre {3}{R} // Creature — Ogre Shaman // Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) // Pay 3 life: Add {R}. // 2/3
attachments.text:

text: Well, crap. Now I have to rewrite half my article because some people preemptively did what I was gonna tell them to do:joy:
